text: Jerzy Szczakiel (28 January 1949 - 1 September 2020) was a Polish Speedway rider. He was one of three Polish nationals to win the Speedway World Championship.Bamford, R. & Shailes, G. (2002). A History of the World Speedway Championship. Stroud: Tempus Publishing. He won the championship in 1973. He was born in Grudzice, Poland. Szczakiel died on 1 September 2020 in Paris, aged 71.Jerzy Szczakiel nie żyje. Był pierwszym polskim mistrzem świata na żużlu ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish speedway riders
title: Jerzy Szczakiel
